Iinari! Saimin Kanojo:
Based on an adult PC game by Courreges Ace. 

Takuma has a crush on Megumi, but is unable to confess or date her. When browsing on his phone, he comes across a hypnosis program and decides to try it. Could this be the thing to bring him closer to Megumi? Perhaps it will make her simply obey, which could be a lot of fun too...
['Iinari! Saimin Kanojo: Reizoku Sennou Namahame Seikatsu']

[['Sadayama, Yanaha', 'Storyboard'], ['Soft Circle Courreges', 'Original Creator'], ['Nakamori, Koutarou', 'Key Animation, Character Design, Animation Director'], ['K-ko', 'Original Character Design']]
